text: Peter Bares (16 January 1936 - 2 March 2014) was a German organist and composer. He was best known for his church music. He was born in Essen. Bares died on 2 March 2014 in Rhineland-Palatinate. He was 78 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:German organists Category:Musicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:People from Essen
title: Peter Bares
